column4: what is the command line to edit grub2 in 12.04?    I remember i have to update-grub, but don't recall the line to get to edit...
use your favorite editor to edit /etc/default/grub
it is a read only in etc/default/grub  i remember there was a sudo command in terminal i could use to edit in terminal.  Help?
indeed. If you are using a cli editor, then you can use sudo vi /etc/default/grub
